Welcome to Viya 3.4 Custom Authorization’s documentation!¶

customize_authorization.main()¶
Usage:

python generate_custom_authorization_groups.py [–options]

Examples:
  1. Build/re-build auto-maintained groups from a group definition file:

    python generate_custom_authorization_groups.py -agf auto-groups.csv

auth_and_rest_helpers.get_oauth_token()¶

Generate a bearer token for a particular SAS Viya services node. :return: oath_token: a bearer token
